thread.title: Clean pleasant budget hotel Acacia, Paris, France
thread.title_full: Clean pleasant budget hotel - Review of Hotel Acacia, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: sunshyn468
title: Clean pleasant budget hotel Acacia, Paris, France
text:
A gem for the price. Room was fairly large, plain and simple, clean, updated tiled bathroom, good WiFi, pleasant helpful staff. Had elevator. Room was heated by a radiator to a perfect temperature for winter. Hotel close to several Metro stops so convenient location though not central. I would definitely stay here again.
Room Tip: Rooms have thin walls but was fairly quiet. See more room tips
